title: Interpretation of seeing a sofa in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a sofa by Ibn SirinInterpretation of seeing a sofa inside a dream is evidence of kindness and abundant sustenance if the sofa is new. Seeing buying a new sofa in a dream is a sign of the dreamer’s strength and support for earning money. If a person sees in his dream that he is buying a used sofa, this means that he is wasting his time on things It is useless and he needs to review his accounts. The sofa is Nabulsi’s dream. If one sees in a dream that he is sitting on the sofa and feels a lot of happiness and comfort, this indicates days full of goodness and nourishment that will come to the dreamer. A white sofa in a dream is a sign of kindness and a feeling of psychological stability. The sofa indicates Broken in a dream indicates the dreamer’s inability to achieve goals and realize ambitions. Interpretation of seeing a sofa for single people: Seeing a sofa in an unmarried girl’s dream in the bedroom means that this girl will get married soon. The girl is changing the sofa in the old house with a new one. This is good news for her regarding mental and behavioral changes. Which will be for the better. As for the dream of sitting on a sofa, it is evidence of success and stability. Dreaming of seeing a sofa for a married woman. Seeing buying a new sofa in a married woman’s dream indicates some changes in her life for the better. If a married woman sees in a dream that she is moving a sofa from one room to another, This indicates happy events that occur in her life. Interpretation of a dream about a sofa for a pregnant woman: Seeing a dream about a pregnant woman on a sofa in a dream is good news about a natural birth without problems. If a pregnant woman sees that she is buying a sofa, this indicates that she will give birth to a baby girl. The sofa indicates in general In a pregnant woman’s dream, there is an easy birth. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a sofa for a man: A man’s dream in a dream transports a sofa from one place to another, this is evidence of new changes in his work and may be an indication of achieving a prominent higher position. As for seeing a sofa burning in a man’s dream, this indicates problems that The dreamer faces it. Seeing buying an old sofa in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is wasting a lot of opportunities and time. Add the dream that you would like to interpret by referring to the marital status in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing the soul ascend in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the resurrection of the soul in a dream by Ibn Sirin: The great scholar Muhammad ibn Sirin says that the vision of the rise of the human soul in a dream indicates the death of worries, problems, and sorrows. Also, seeing a man among deceased relatives indicates that his soul is looking forward to heaven, and this is evidence that the dreamer’s life will change for the better. It is also claimed that by seeing the appearance of the spirit of a deceased man in his life, a married woman and her husband, that woman goes through many financial crises. Interpretation of seeing the spirit ascending in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream the spirit of someone she knows ascending, this indicates the removal of her worries and good deeds. Also, seeing the spirit ascending in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates the many pressures that the girl is going through in her life, as well as extreme exhaustion. Also, to see the spirit ascending in an unmarried girl, then controlling herself and starting a new life, indicates her close marriage with A person you love. Seeing the soul ascending in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates the success and reputation that she will experience in her next life, which she will shine with, God willing. Interpretation of seeing the soul ascending in a dream for a married woman. Seeing the soul ascending in a married woman’s dream is good news of the existence of ample livelihood. In her future life and her husband, her problems and sorrows will be removed. Also, seeing a woman’s soul in a dream indicates praiseworthy visions that show goodness to her and abundance and bring money and livelihood. Seeing a married woman in a dream indicates the soul of her husband, because it is news of pregnancy, and also the financial and material crises that she is going through. Interpretation of seeing the spirit ascending in a dream for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees in her dream her spirit ascending, this indicates the disappearance of her worries, but the difficulty of giving birth and she will live, God willing. Also, dreaming of the pregnant woman’s spirit rising indicates that her husband will move to a new job and be promoted to the highest positions, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing the soul rising in a dream for men: If a man sees in a dream a dream about his soul rising, this indicates the collapse of his worries and joining a new job that he will strive for. Also, seeing the soul rising of its owner or one of his relatives in a dream indicates paying off accumulated debts, which means hiding something that he is avoiding. Its occurrence. Seeing a person raised up in a dream indicates the occurrence of something that beautifies the dreamer with its beauty, and shows the act of disobedience, sins, and repentance from them. Interpretation of a dream about the soul coming out and witnessing the tashahhud in a dream. Whoever sees in a dream that he is witnessing and his soul is awakened, this indicates good deeds, closeness, and repentance to God Almighty. As This vision indicates faith in God Almighty, good deeds, and the arrival of livelihood and legitimate money. It also indicates instability, and God knows best. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below and a team of experts will respond to you as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of a dream about the letter B in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the letter B by Imam Al-Sadiq for free. There are many different signs and symbols associated with the letter B, as many interpreters have done, and you may be interested in meeting the deceased father in a dream, and scholars have listed them briefly so that they are a distinctive and quick reference for all people, of these signs, the most important of which are seeing the cold, the lake, the eggplant, the sea, the door, the parrot and other signs and symbols, and different. You may also be interested in: Library in a dream Interpretation of the dream of the letter B by Imam Al-Sadiq for free for a married woman The interpretation of the dream varies according to the condition of the seer. Imam Al-Sadiq interpreted dreams that begin with the letter “Ba” for a married woman in a special indication, which is: If a married woman sees a parrot in a dream, this means that there are successive and enjoyable events and news. It can mean good news about pregnancy if the parrot is not tied up, imprisoned or slaughtered. This bird is one of the distinctive and beautiful birds. When a married woman sees a well in a dream and there is no water in it, this indicates distress, challenges and many problems that she faces in her life. If a married woman sees eggs in her dream, provided that they are healthy, this indicates a lot of nutrition and affection, and it also symbolizes the presence of eggs. Pregnancy expresses fertility and may indicate the birth of a male. Black and red dates are signs of livelihood, the more delicious the taste of dates, the vision portends good and beautiful news and good health, but if the taste of dates is sour, this indicates bad news. title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a bridge in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a bridge in a dream and crossing the bridge indicates overcoming difficulties and achieving desires, as this bridge is used to move from one place to another, but seeing the bridge in a dream causes confusion and anxiety for many people, the bridge indicates overcoming adversity and difficulties and overcoming life’s problems, Therefore, we will learn about the most important dream interpretation of seeing a bridge in a dream. Ibn Sirin’s dream of seeing a bridge. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a bridge is evidence of positive changes in the life of the witness. Seeing a dreamer crossing a broken bridge is a warning of the danger and misfortune that will fall into it. Seeing a collapsing bridge in a dream means divorce. Or illness. A strong bridge shows the speed of reaching the goal. As for a small bridge in a dream, it indicates the difficulty of achieving the goal. Crossing a long bridge in my dream indicates positive changes that will occur. For single men, crossing a bridge in a dream is a sign of a short marriage. Seeing married women crossing bridges in their dreams is a sign of good news and good luck. The bridge that a woman dreams of in a dream symbolizes the degree of family stability. Seeing a pregnant woman crossing the bridge in her dream is good news and facilitates her birth. Crossing the bridge in a separate dream proves that you have overcome The divorce crisis in a simpler way. Seeing the bridge in a widow’s dream proves that she is suffering from sadness, pain, and a happy life.. Dreaming of seeing the bridge to Nabulsi. Seeing a bridge collapsing in a dream is a sign of severing social ties and kinship. Seeing a bridge collapsing is a warning of failure. Seeing the bridge collapsing is evidence On the failure of emotional communication. As for the married woman whose bridge collapsed in her dreams, this indicates family problems. The man saw in his dream that he seemed to fall from the bridge, which indicates that he has many warnings of problems and troubles. As for the single woman who saw herself falling From the bridge, there is evidence that she has lost someone valuable to her. Therefore, if a married woman sees in her dream that she appears to be falling from the bridge, this indicates the presence of marital or family problems. Seeing a pregnant woman walking on a bridge in her dreams indicates that she Worried about losing the fetus. Seeing a divorced woman falling from a bridge shows that she felt remorse. Seeing a widow falling from a bridge in a dream indicates her pain and suffering from grief, pain, and exhaustion in her life. A secret in a dream indicates that something cannot happen, such as finding A job, having a child, or earning a living. Seeing a bridge being broken, indicates a failed engagement. Seeing married women breaking a bridge or a piece in their dreams is a sign of divorce. Dreaming of seeing a bridge under water. Crossing a bridge in a dream means overcoming obstacles and adversities. Seeing a bridge in a dream indicates On the fulfillment of dreams. Seeing the passage over the bridge indicates overcoming difficulties, provided that the water is clear and clean. Seeing yourself crossing turbid water indicates bad luck and difficulties. Dreaming of seeing the bridge by Ibn ShaheenSeeing someone walking over a wooden bridge indicates a close marriage. The wooden bridge indicates also

title: Interpretation of a dream about a phone call from a dead person in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a phone call from a dead person in a dream Dreams are common in our time that people are looking for an interpretation of them, and in this article we will talk about a dream about a dead person in a dream, which is one of the dreams that many people repeat, and when you see a dead person talking on the phone, this symbolizes that the deceased wants to convey something to his family, whether it is advice, a warning or anything else, otherwise he wants to communicate. Interpretation of a dream about a phone call from a dead woman In the following points, we will explain to you the interpretation of a dream about a phone call from a dead woman: If a single girl dreams that she is talking to a dead person on the phone who may be related to her, the dream indicates that this part of the dead benefits from him and benefits from him in her life. As for if the girl sees that a dead person is calling her and warning her about something, the dream shows that she is interested in him and refrains from what harms her in life and that God Almighty is greater. But when a married woman sees that her deceased father-in-law told her over the phone that he bought him gifts and gave him good news over the phone, this dream indicates that she will have good energy and abundance in her life. If a married woman sees that the dead person is warning her over the phone about an important matter, then the dream indicates that she will face a danger or a problem in her life, and she must be careful in her life to avoid that completely. On her life and God Almighty is high. But when the divorced woman sees that she is talking to a dead person on the phone and the conversation is full of peace and good news, then the dream shows that she has been freed from her problems in her life and that God gives her goodness and peace. And an abundance of money in life and God is the Great and All-Knowing. As for seeing the call and the phone ringing, and when the divorced person answers the phone and finds that the person who called her has already died, then the dream indicates that this person wants to send a message to his family and wants to advise them about something. And God Almighty is All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about a phone call from a dead man In the following points, we will tell you the interpretation of a dream about a phone call from a dead person for men: As for if a person sees in a dream that he is talking to a dead person on the phone and talking to him and knowing his condition, then the dream indicates that he will get rid of worries and get rid of many problems in his life, and God Almighty and God knows best. But if someone sees that a dead person he knows is calling him on the phone and asking him for something, then the dream indicates that this dead person is asking for charity for his soul or asking his offspring so that someone remembers him with his grace. God knows best and is higher. As for if a young man sees that a dead person is calling him on the phone, then the dream indicates that he will get a lot of food in his life, and if he is still a student, then the dream indicates success and excellence, God willing. He knows better. But when the young man sees that the dead person is calling him on the phone and asking him for something, the dream indicates that the dead person wants to remember him by praying for him with pity and forgiveness and by reciting the Qur’an, and God Almighty knows best. title: The most important interpretations of seeing eating bread in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Eating bread in a dream for a single woman is one of the dreams that raise many questions in the minds of dreamers and makes them want to know the clues that point to it. Distinguished scholars have given us many interpretations on this subject, which will be discussed in this article. Eating bread in a dream for a single woman A woman’s dream For a single woman, eating bread in a dream has many positive connotations for her because it expresses a great blessing in her life. And Hannah, who sees the dreamer while she is sleeping eating bread in her dream, is a sign that she will receive a marriage proposal from one of them soon. In case the dreamer ate bread in her dream and it did not taste good and she does not want to finish it, this indicates that she feels very confused about one of the important issues. In her life and unable to make a certain decision. She has a lot of good morals that she really likes to deal with. Eating bread in a dream for an unmarried woman by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets seeing an unmarried woman eating bread in her dream as evidence that she will live for a long time and have very good physical health. Because she is eating cornmeal bread, this is a sign that she is exposed to very bad economic conditions, and she is angry about that. If the girl eats barley bread in her dream, this is a sign of her closeness to the Creator (Glory be to Him) and her desire to perform duties and acts of obedience in her time. Asrar website for dream interpretation It is a site specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just write: A site about the secrets of dream interpretation. Search on Google and get the correct interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about eating fresh bread for a single woman. An unmarried woman who eats fresh bread in a dream indicates that she will soon receive good news, and fresh bread in a dream The dreamer symbolizes the stability that she enjoys at that time and the great happiness that she lives among her family and loved ones, and seeing fresh bread in her dream indicates the success that she will achieve professionally in the coming period and the financial gains that she will gain as a result. The girl who eats fresh bread in her dream is a sign of... The goals that she will achieve and will easily overcome difficulties because she is very wise in her actions and knows how to make a decision and bear its consequences. Interpretation of a dream about eating bread and falafel. A person’s dream that he is eating bread and falafel in his dream indicates the approaching marriage of a girl he loves very much, and the dreamer eats bread and falafel during his sleep indicates that many Good events will happen in his life during the coming period. He started it a while ago and is very happy with what he will achieve as a result. In the event that a girl eats bread and falafel with one of her friends, this is evidence of the strong bond and stable relationship that unites them and shares secrets and beautiful moments together. The dreamer expresses that she has made a great effort to earn her livelihood for the day, and therefore God (the Most High) has blessed her greatly in her livelihood. Interpretation of a dream about eating white bread for a single woman: An unmarried woman eating white bread in her dream indicates that soon many happy events will occur in her dream.

title: Seeing a burqa in a dream for a single, married or pregnant woman

preview.html: One of the symbols that many people repeat in dreams is seeing a burqa in a dream, whether it is a man or a woman, so there is a lot of research on the interpretation or meaning of seeing a burqa to find out if it is good. News or warning. Here in this article we will discuss with you the interpretation of seeing a burqa in a dream, buying a burqa in a dream, interpretation of a dream about a burqa for a single woman, a burqa in a dream for a single woman, interpretation of a dream about the burqa for a married woman and the burqa in a dream for a pregnant woman in detail, so follow us with interest. The burqa in Dream: The burqa in a dream symbolizes the good things, blessings and judgments that will soon fill the dreamer’s life. Interpretation of the dream of the burqa symbolizes the dreamer’s good condition, his religion, piety, piety, and good piety to his Lord through good deeds. Seeing a new veil in a dream is a sign of facilitating matters and changing Attitudes for the better and opening the doors of kindness. It may symbolize the emergence of some positive changes that bring goodness and blessings to the monarch in his life. As for seeing a cut burqa in a dream, it indicates the possibility that the dreamer will face some troubles and problems. An old burqa in a dream symbolizes the many pressures, responsibilities, and burdens that he suffers from. The dreamer in his real life. There is another opinion that says that the interpretation of a dream about a burqa could be a symbol of a bad outcome and a bad ending. Seeing a black burqa in a woman’s dream is a sign of her good morals, good behavior, chastity, goodness, and purity. Dreaming about a burqa in a woman’s dream A single woman indicates that there are good people surrounding her who wish her well and always give her advice. As for seeing a burqa in a married woman’s dream, this indicates stability, prosperity, prosperity, and security in which she lives among her family and her husband. Likewise, seeing a burqa in a pregnant woman’s dream is considered a promising vision for the arrival of many Of good things, joys and happy occasions. See also: Interpretation of a dream about buying from the market. Dreams indicate pregnancy in the same month. Buying a burqa in a dream. Seeing him buying a burqa in a dream symbolizes a positive change in his life that will change it for the better and its positive aspects will be reflected in him soon. Perhaps buying A burqa in a dream indicates that the dreamer will establish a partnership with a person or entity and that this partnership will be successful. Dreaming of buying a burqa that is old and in bad condition symbolizes some bad things such as facing troubles or troubles. If he buys a torn burqa in a dream, this is evidence of some quarrels in His life or perhaps the corruption of his partnership. The burqa in an unmarried woman’s dream. Seeing the burqa in an unmarried woman’s dream symbolizes the presence of a person in her life who has love and good feelings for her. Wearing the burqa in an unmarried woman’s dream is a sign of calming her circumstances, alleviating her anxiety, and bringing innovations in Her life. Seeing the burqa lifted in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates the anguish she suffers because of her father’s dominance and control. The white burqa in an unmarried woman’s dream symbolizes her good morals, purity, and honor.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a volcano and the meaning of a volcano eruption in a dream

preview.html: Interpreters presented their views on the interpretation of a dream about a volcano, the most famous of which is Ibn Sirin, who explained all cases of vision and the dreamer, and below we will return to the interpretation of a dream about a volcano. Volcano, interpretation of a dream about a mountain volcano, interpretation of a dream about a volcano eruption, etc., follow us. Interpretation of a dream about a volcanoInterpretation of a dream about a volcano in a dream can be a sign of a major transformation in the dreamer’s life. Seeing a volcano in a dream can be a sign of victory over enemies and obtaining the right Seeing a volcano in a dream symbolizes the dreamer changing himself in his bad habits. Seeing a volcano in a dream is a warning to the dreamer of the intensity and haste of his emotions. Seeing a volcano in dreams means emotional family crises and problems. To see a volcano, lava, and fire, this indicates entering a stage or world. New. Seeing a volcano and smoke in a dream can also indicate buried feelings of anger. Seeing a volcano in a dream can also indicate creativity and innovation in the dreamer’s life. Interpretation of a dream about a volcano in a dream, it can also symbolize evil, such as illness or poverty. Seeing A person near a volcano in a dream and it explodes loudly, indicates his distraction, confusion, and failure to make decisions. Dreaming of volcanoes with lava and fire indicates a change in the viewer’s beliefs and the way he looks at life. Seeing a volcano in dreams is a sign of psychological growth and spiritual development. For the dreamer as well. Interpretation of a volcano in a dream for a woman may indicate her wrong actions that may cause her harm and damage. Seeing the effects of a volcano in a dream symbolizes many difficulties and problems that must be avoided. Seeing a volcano leaving the house in a dream is a sign of a complete change in life. Seeing the sky raining stones of fire in a dream is evidence of the wrath of Almighty God. Seeing yourself escaping from a volcano in a dream can symbolize overcoming problems and disagreements. Seeing yourself escaping from a volcano in a dream is a sign of entering into major conflicts. See also: Interpretation of fire In a dream, seeing someone burning in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a mountain volcano. Interpretation of a dream about a mountain volcano, accompanied by fire and lava, indicates negative feelings such as despair and disappointment. The interpretation of seeing a volcano on a mountain is also evidence of a bad psychological state and bad luck for the fortuneteller. Seeing a mountain volcano in a dream symbolizes To the dreamer entering into an emotional relationship that will hurt him later. Interpretation of a dream about a mountain volcano for a pregnant woman indicates an incomplete pregnancy. Seeing a volcano on a mountain in a dream for a divorced woman symbolizes the control of sadness and depression over her. Interpretation of a dream about a volcano eruptingInterpretation of a dream about a volcano erupting in a dream for one person is evidence of His marriage is approaching. Seeing a volcano erupting in a dream symbolizes the great benefit that accrues to the dreamer in his life. Interpretation of a dream about a volcano for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about a volcano for a single woman can indicate her random action and without prior thinking. Interpretation of a dream about a volcano for a single woman is good news of marriage soon, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about a volcano for a single woman is also a sign

title: Interpretation of a dream about snakes in the house for a married woman

preview.html: If a dream of a snake is seen in a married woman’s dream, it brings more fear and anxiety to her and others, as it can indicate evil, especially if it is seen at home, but the interpretation of the vision is based on it. The dreamer of nature and the nature of the dream, so stay with us to learn these differences together. Interpretation of a dream about snakes in the house for a married womanIf a married woman dreams that there are snakes in her house, this may be a sign of the instability of life for her. It also indicates many daily endeavors that may work on Keeping her away from her husband, and God knows best. If a married woman sees snakes in her dream. It could be an indication of the psychological problems and responsibilities surrounding her. It also indicates an inability to carry out what has been entrusted to her, and God knows best. When a married woman dreams of a snake in her home. This is a sign. A flirtatious woman who is trying to steal her husband from her, so be very careful. When a married woman dreams that her husband catches a snake and cuts it into three parts. This may be an indication of disagreements that may lead to undesirable results, and God knows best. When a married woman sees in her dream that There is a dead snake in the bed. This may be a sign that she is exposed to a difficult disease, but the cure is in the hands of God. If a married woman sees in her dream the presence of snakes in her house. This may mean that she has an enemy, and the enemy may be embodied in her person. It also indicates problems And the crises that it causes, and God knows best. When a married woman sees in her dream that there are snakes in her house, and they are red. This may be a sign of a disturbance in the emotional relationship between her and her husband. It also indicates many feelings and feelings of anger that are not needed, and God knows best. If a married woman sees snakes in her dream. This may mean turmoil and temptation, so hasten to repent and ask for forgiveness. We chose for you: The snake in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about a snake for a married woman by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin indicates that if you see large snakes in a married woman’s house, it may be This is evidence of the problems and disputes that may arise between the monarch and the husband. Ibn Sirin explains that if a married woman sees a green snake in her dream in her home, this indicates that it is a sign of abundant food and abundant money. Ibn Sirin explains that when a married woman dreams of small snakes in her home. It may mean that he is going through some minor crises that are easy to get out of, God willing. Ibn Sirin explains that if a married woman sees a white snake in her dream in her house. This may indicate the presence of a malicious woman close to her life who is trying to harm her in any way, so beware. Ibn Sirin believes Sirin says that if a woman sees a green snake in a dream, then she is married. It could be a sign of a wonderful life and a lot of money that the dreamer can get. When a married woman sees in her dream the presence of small snakes in her house. This may mean that she may go through some crises. The small one that is easy to get out of, God willing. Ibn Sirin explains that when a woman dreams of...

title: Interpretation of a dream about someone you love in my house and its implications

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about someone you love in your home is one of the dreams that make the dreamer feel very happy. A person always wants his lovers to come to him, especially if they are far from him. In fact, seeing someone you love in a dream can reflect a strong longing for that. The person and the urgent desire to meet him, and this vision carries different connotations, but it can be considered one of the visions worthy of praise, and in this article we will explain the interpretation of a dream about someone you love in my house. Interpretation of dreams about someone you love in my house for a married woman: seeing a married woman who loves another person in a dream outside her home and present in her house It indicates problems that arise between spouses, and the following is the interpretation of a dream about a person who loves in my house for a married woman: If a married woman dreams of her lover in her house, this may mean that good things are coming her way. Perhaps the vision means that there are some breakthroughs in the dreamer’s life. While the presence of a lover in a divorced woman’s home may mean that she strongly desires to be attached to him and that she desires to live with him for the rest of her life. There are also some interpreters who believe that seeing the presence of a lover in a married woman’s dream is an unpleasant vision. This means that some harm will occur. For the dreamer. See also: Interpretation of a dream that sees a Muslim converting to Christianity. Interpretation of a dream about a lover telling you about a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman dreams that her lover is talking to her, this means that her birth will go smoothly and will be painless, God willing, and this vision shows the following: The appearance of a lover in a pregnant woman’s dream means She will give birth to a child with the qualities present in the lover. If this lover is the pregnant woman’s husband, this means that the pregnant woman lives in family stability with her husband in reality. Regarding the evil of this vision, it was said that the appearance of the beloved in the pregnant woman’s dream is a warning to her of the need to stay away from forbidden things. During this period, turn to God. If the lover whom the pregnant woman saw in a dream dies, this indicates following an extensive diet. And many good things that the dreamer will receive in the next period of her life. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a veil in a dream by months Scientists with a complete interpretationInterpretation of a dream about someone she loves in my house and he ignores me. Seeing an unmarried woman in her dream is someone she loves in her house, but she ignores her is one of the dreams that warn the dreamer of some unpleasant connotations. The vision may mean evil reaching the dreamer or falling into some problems. But he will be able to overcome it, and the following are the various indicators of this vision: A lover ignoring an unmarried woman in a dream indicates that he is going through some problems. The vision also means that the dreamer is going through psychological problems and must try to control the anxiety and sadness that afflict him. A lover who ignores can One girl in a dream may be evidence that this lover does not love that girl. And that he may be playing with her feelings and she must be careful. Imam Al-Sadiq interpreted seeing an unmarried woman ignoring her lover in a dream as being broken and weak and needing the support of her family. See also: Interpretation of a solution
